H0.text: when is saint george day celebrated. May 6

H1.text: when is saint george day celebrated. November 17

H2.text: when is saint george day celebrated. April 24

H3.text: when is saint george day celebrated. April 23

A4.text: Saint George's Day is usually celebrated on 23 April, the traditionally accepted date of the saint's death in the Diocletianic Persecution.

A5.text: Exceptionally in the Czech Republic, Hungary and Slovakia, Saint George's Day comes on 24 April.

A6.text: The Catholic Church does not celebrate Saint George's Day on May 6.

A7.text: The Catholic Church does not celebrate Saint George's Day on November 17.

A8.text: Saint George's Day is not celebrated on April 24; the majority of countries observe it on April 23.

A9.text: Saint George's Day is celebrated on April 23 by the Catholic Church.
